verses.roman:
sei tina saṅge cale, prabhu niṣedhila
dūra haite tina-jane ghare pāṭhāila

synonyms: sei tina—those three; saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; cale—go; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; niṣedhila—forbade; dūra haite—from a distance; tina-jane—the three persons; ghare—home; pāṭhāila—sent back.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu started for Mathurā, all three devotees started to go with Him. However, the Lord forbade them to accompany Him, and from a distance He asked them to return home.
